page.title: 14Wetwang,Farm Work.
page.content: A lot of people in Wetwang are employed on farms.Some{farmworkers are employed{permenantly}to drive tractors and combines. Other people on our farm clean out bins,help maintain machinery,plough fields,burn straw, drill fields and do odd jobs around the farm as well as a number of other jobs. The{farmer}helps out a bit and organises things and fills out bills,writes letters and answers telephone calls. Some people just come{at a {certain time of the year}to pick sprouts, spuds, wild oats etc. Some teenagers in the village just help out for extra pocket money.Another sort of farm employment is truck driving. Factorys employ men to come and collect and transport the grain and peas, suger beet etc.{ }
